publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5134 Mr Frank McAveety: Commonwealth Games Fitness Challenge—That the Parliament congratulates Playbusters on developing Connecting Generations Commonwealth Games Fitness Challenge, a programme that aims to bring together both old and young for sporting activities; recognises its efforts to increase fitness levels, break down generational barriers and raise awareness of the 2014 Commonwealth Games in Glasgow; further recognises the Big Lottery Fund for its generous grant to start the programme, and wishes Playbusters well in the continuing good work it does in the east end of Glasgow.

S3M-5134 Commonwealth Games Fitness Challenge (lodged on 4 November 2009) Gil Paterson*, Anne McLaughlin*, Pauline McNeill*, Robin Harper*, Trish Godman*, Bob Doris*, James Kelly*, Jackie Baillie*, Hugh Henry*, Ken Macintosh*, Paul Martin*, David Whitton*, Sandra White*, Des McNulty*

S3M-5134 Mr Frank McAveety: Commonwealth Games Fitness Challenge—That the Parliament congratulates Playbusters on developing Connecting Generations Commonwealth Games Fitness Challenge, a programme that aims to bring together both old and young for sporting activities; recognises its efforts to increase fitness levels, break down generational barriers and raise awareness of the 2014 Commonwealth Games in Glasgow; further recognises the Big Lottery Fund for its generous grant to start the programme, and wishes Playbusters well in the continuing good work it does in the east end of Glasgow. Supported by: Gil Paterson, Anne McLaughlin, Pauline McNeill, Robin Harper, Trish Godman, Bob Doris, James Kelly, Jackie Baillie, Hugh Henry, Ken Macintosh, Paul Martin, David Whitton, Sandra White, Des McNulty, Mary Mulligan*, Karen Gillon*
S3M-5134 Commonwealth Games Fitness Challenge (lodged on 4 November 2009) Sarah Boyack*
S3M-5134 Commonwealth Games Fitness Challenge (lodged on 4 November 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-5134 Commonwealth Games Fitness Challenge (lodged on 4 November 2009) Helen Eadie*
